textAfterTable: According to our current on-line database, C.-C. Lin has 22 students and 475 descendants. We welcome any additional information. If you have additional information or corrections regarding this mathematician, please use the update form. To submit students of this mathematician, please use the new data form, noting this mathematician's MGP ID of 13385 for the advisor ID.
